titles.title: Reinforcing the Grid Against Extreme Weather Act
Reinforcing the Grid Against Extreme Weather Act
To provide for minimum transfer capability requirements between transmission planning regions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Reinforcing the Grid Against Extreme Weather Act
This bill requires the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to issue a rule to establish minimum transfer capabilities between transmission planning regions to help stabilize the electric grid.
